resources.string:
The object of the game is to prevent the ball from falling to the ground, 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 To push the ball in a specific direction, we will press on the screen in the opposite direction 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 And the goal was also to learn thread persistence 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 but we are not learning anything xd 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Cheer up! xdddddd
